March 08, 16 23:33:03 by Codo 2.0.11 ✲ Press H to see the keyboard shortcuts ✲ @netzpirat ✲ @_inossidabile

    Quickly fuzzy find classes, mixins, methods, file:

    • T Open fuzzy finder dialog

    Control the navigation frame:

    • L Toggle list view
    • C Show class list
    • I Show mixin list
    • F Show file list
    • M Show method list
    • E Show extras list

    You can focus and blur the search input:

    • S Focus search input
    • Esc Blur search input
